page.title: 05INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: {MOBILE LIBRARY}Visits from Hampshire County Library Service (Romsey) every two weeks. Service free, stops in 4 places: Swarraton (Grange entrance), Totford (crossroads), Northington (village hall), Northington (church lane). {NOTICE BOARDS}One outside Village Hall, owned and used by Parish Council for election notices also used by local organisations. One in church porch, used solely for church affairs. {LOCAL NEWSPAPER} "Hampshire Chronicle" published and printed weekly in Winchester. Contains news from local correspondents (W.I. etc.). {Parish Magazine} "OXDROVE" published monthly, covers all Candover Valley, delivered to every house (cost 15p), letter from Rector, details of Church services, events, articles of local interest, advertisements.
